verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> you the word <S%H1697><s%> which the Lord <S%H3068><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> unto you <S%H1004><s%>, O house of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Learn <S%H3925><s%> not the way <S%H1870><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and be not dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at the signs <S%H226><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>; for the heathen <S%H1471><s%> are dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at them <S%H1992><s%>.

For the customs <S%H2708><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> are vain <S%H1892><s%>: for one cuts <S%H3772><s%> a tree <S%H6086><s%> out of the forest <S%H3293><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the workman <S%H2796><s%>, with the axe <S%H4621><s%>.
They deck <S%H3302><s%> it with silver <S%H3701><s%> and with gold <S%H2091><s%>; they fasten <S%H2388><s%> it with nails <S%H4548><s%> and with hammers <S%H4717><s%>, that it move not <S%H6328><s%>.

They are upright <S%H4749><s%> as the palm tree <S%H8560><s%>, but speak <S%H1696><s%> not <S%H5375><s%>: they must needs be borne <S%H5375><s%>, because they cannot go <S%H6805><s%>. Be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them <S%H7489><s%>; for they cannot do evil, neither also is it in them to do good <S%H3190><s%>.
Forasmuch as there is none like unto you <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord; you are great <S%H1419><s%>, and your name <S%H8034><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> in might <S%H1369><s%>.

Who would not fear <S%H3372><s%> you <S%H4428><s%>, O King of nations <S%H1471><s%>? for to you does it appertain <S%H2969><s%>: forasmuch as among all the wise <S%H2450><s%> men of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and in all their kingdoms <S%H4438><s%>, there is none like unto you.
But they are altogether <S%H259><s%> brutish <S%H1197><s%> and foolish <S%H3688><s%>: the stock <S%H6086><s%> is a teaching <S%H4148><s%> of vanities <S%H1892><s%>.

Silver <S%H3701><s%> spread into plates <S%H7554><s%> is brought <S%H935><s%> from Tarshish <S%H8659><s%>, and gold <S%H2091><s%> from Uphaz <S%H210><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of the workman <S%H2796><s%>, and of the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the founder <S%H6884><s%>: blue <S%H8504><s%> and purple <S%H713><s%> is their clothing <S%H3830><s%>: they are all the work <S%H4639><s%> of skillful men <S%H2450><s%>.

But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is the true <S%H571><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, he is the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, and a everlasting <S%H5769><s%> king <S%H4428><s%>: at his wrath <S%H7110><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> shall tremble <S%H7493><s%>, and the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall not be able to stay <S%H3557><s%> his indignation <S%H2195><s%>.

Thus <S%H1836><s%> shall you say <S%H560><s%> unto them <S%H426><s%>, The gods that have not <S%H3809><s%> made <S%H5648><s%> the heavens <S%H8065><s%> and the earth <S%H778><s%>, even they shall perish <S%H7><s%> from the earth <S%H772><s%>, and from under <S%H8460><s%> these <S%H429><s%> heavens <S%H8065><s%>.

He has made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> by his power <S%H3581><s%>, he has established <S%H3559><s%> the world <S%H8398><s%> by his wisdom <S%H2451><s%>, and has stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> by his discretion <S%H8394><s%>.

When he utters <S%H5414><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%>, there is a multitude <S%H1995><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> in the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and he causes the vapors <S%H5387><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>; he makes <S%H6213><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> with rain <S%H4306><s%>, and brings forth <S%H3318><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> out of his treasures <S%H214><s%>.

Every man <S%H120><s%> is brutish <S%H1197><s%> in his knowledge <S%H1847><s%>: every founder <S%H6884><s%> is confounded <S%H3001><s%> by the engraved image <S%H6459><s%>: for his molten image <S%H5262><s%> is falsehood <S%H8267><s%>, and there is no breath in them <S%H7307><s%>.
They are vanity <S%H1892><s%>, and the work <S%H4639><s%> of errors <S%H8595><s%>: in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their visitation <S%H6486><s%> they shall perish <S%H6><s%>.

The portion <S%H2506><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is not like them <S%H3335><s%>: for he is the former of all things <S%H3478><s%>; and Israel is the rod <S%H7626><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: The Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is his name <S%H8034><s%>.
Gather up <S%H622><s%> your wares <S%H3666><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%>, O inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of the fortress <S%H4692><s%>.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, Behold <S%H7049><s%>, I will sling out the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> at this once <S%H6471><s%>, and will distress <S%H6887><s%> them <S%H4672><s%>, that they may find it so.

Woe <S%H188><s%> is me for my hurt <S%H7667><s%>! my wound <S%H4347><s%> is severe <S%H2470><s%>: but I said <S%H559><s%>, Truly <S%H389><s%> this is a grief <S%H2483><s%>, and I must carry it <S%H5375><s%>.

My tabernacle <S%H168><s%> is spoiled <S%H7703><s%>, and all my cords <S%H4340><s%> are broken <S%H5423><s%>: my sons <S%H1121><s%> are gone forth <S%H3318><s%> of me <S%H5186><s%>, and they are not: there is none to stretch forth my tent <S%H168><s%> any more <S%H6965><s%>, and to set up my curtains <S%H3407><s%>.

For the pastors <S%H7462><s%> are become brutish <S%H1197><s%>, and have not sought <S%H1875><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: therefore they shall not prosper <S%H7919><s%>, and all their flocks <S%H4830><s%> shall be scattered <S%H6327><s%>.

Behold <S%H6963><s%>, the noise of the report <S%H8052><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, and a great <S%H1419><s%> commotion <S%H7494><s%> out of the north <S%H6828><s%> country <S%H776><s%>, to make <S%H7760><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> desolate <S%H8077><s%>, and a den <S%H4583><s%> of dragons <S%H8577><s%>.

O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, I know <S%H3045><s%> that the way <S%H1870><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> is not in himself <S%H376><s%>: it is not in man that walks <S%H1980><s%> to direct <S%H3559><s%> his steps <S%H6806><s%>.
O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, correct <S%H3256><s%> me <S%H4941><s%>, but with judgment; not in your anger <S%H639><s%>, lest you bring me to nothing <S%H4591><s%>.

Pour out <S%H8210><s%> your fury <S%H2534><s%> upon the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that know <S%H3045><s%> you not <S%H4940><s%>, and upon the families that call <S%H7121><s%> not on your name <S%H8034><s%>: for they have eaten up <S%H398><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and devoured <S%H398><s%> him <S%H3615><s%>, and consumed him <S%H5116><s%>, and have made his habitation desolate <S%H8074><s%>.
